opinions.snippet:
Flynn, C. J.
This is an indictment charging that the defendant on March 14, 1953 “with force and arms, at Providence in the aforesaid County of Providence did rob one Anna Mainelli.” After a trial in the superior court a jury returned a verdict of guilty as charged and thereafter the trial justice denied the defendant’s motion for a new.trial.
